Best Fashion eCommerce Marketplace Software for Online Retailers

Transform your fashion business with 6Valley's fashion eCommerce marketplace software. Easily manage multiple vendors with chic themes & provide a seamless shopping experience for your fashion-forward audience.

Get Started
Explore Free Demo

Diverse Categories, Endless Possibilities

6Valley offers versatile B2C fashion eCommerce marketplace software tailored for various fashion niches. From women's and men's elegant clothing to stylish kids' wear, bags, jewelry, footwear, accessories, and personal care items - every fashion business gets a seat!

    • What Makes 6Valley the Ultimate Fashion eCommerce Marketplace Software?

    Fashion Marketplace App with Advanced Search

    For apparel eCommerce solutions like yours, it’s essential to have an advanced search & filtration feature. Your customers should be able to quickly find exactly what they're looking for, whether it's a specific brand, style, color, or size. Thereby, you can influence their purchase decision positively.

    With this feature, you can deliver a seamless shopping experience, increase conversions, and address the most common frustrating point of customers online.

    Easily Switch Between Single & Multi Vendor Models

    With 6Valley, you have the flexibility to start as a single-vendor store & easily transition to a multi-vendor marketplace as your business grows. It simplifies the process of onboarding new vendors, making it easy to expand your marketplace.

    Guided setup processes make it simple for fashion vendors to swiftly list their products & start selling. The ability to switch models as needed ensures you can adapt to fashion trends & customer demands.

    Fashion Site for Local & International Business

    Expand your reach beyond borders with a platform designed for both local and international business. Along with local fashion enthusiasts, your high-end fashion marketplace will be able to attract a global audience.

    With settings like multiple currencies, languages & shipping options the platform makes it easier for you to control the entire business despite the location. That way you can not only reduce risk but also increase revenues.

    Cross Platform Apparel & Fashion Marketplace

    6valley fashion eCommerce app development solution ensures seamless access across all devices with cross-platform performance. Whether customers are shopping from their phone, tablet, or desktop, it delivers a consistent experience.

    It is compatible with both iOS and Android devices. To maintain a competitive edge in the fast-paced fashion industry and reach a wide range of customers this adaptability of fashion marketplace app is a must.

    Multiple Payment Supported Fashion Marketplace

    Provide your fashion eCommerce site users with a seamless shopping experience by offering multiple payment gateway, including cash on delivery, digital payment & offline payments.

    This flexibility gives them the convenience to choose their preferred payment method before each purchase. As easy checkout & security are the top priorities in the fashion industry, this feature reduces the cart abandonment ratio from online fashion marketplaces.

    All Essential Panels for Online Fashion Marketplace

    6Valley provides dedicated panels for admin, vendor, customers & deliveryman ensuring each stakeholder in the fashion eCommerce ecosystem has a feature-rich experience.

    Admins can efficiently manage overall business while fashion stores showcase product variations and manage orders. The customer app offers a user-friendly interface. It allows easy browsing & purchase from a wide range of fashion items while the deliveryman app ensures timely deliveries.

    Retain Users Using Fashion eCommerce Platform

    Increase customer loyalty with features designed to retain users on your fashion eCommerce platform. This includes options like coupons, flash deals, deal of the day, featured deals, wallet & loyalty points, etc.

    Loyal customers in the fashion industry become brand advocates & promote your marketplace through word of mouth. So these features keep them coming back on luxury fashion eCommerce sites, increasing revenue & overall growth of the brand.

    Seamless 3rd Party Integrations In Fashion Site

    Integrate important third-party services into your fashion eCommerce site with ease. Connect with social media, configure email and SMS features, add reCAPTCHA for security, and incorporate Google Maps for location accuracy.

    These integrations enhance user experience, streamline operations, and improve security. It leads to higher conversion rates, boosts customer satisfaction, and increases profitability in the competitive fashion industry.

    Start Your Fashion eCommerce Marketplace Today!

    Get Started

    6Valley Lifestyle Theme for Fashion eCommerce

    To elevate your fashion eCommerce software 6Valley comes with a Lifestyle theme that offers a stylish, intuitive interface and aligns with the aesthetic needs of fashion enthusiasts.

    Our Lifestyle Theme is designed to improve user experience, giving your site a modern and professional look. It focuses on visual appeal and usability to help vendors showcase fashion products attractively to increase conversions & customer satisfaction.

    Transform Your Fashion eCommerce with 6Valley's Unique Features!

    Discover the essential fashion marketplace features that make 6Valley the best choice for your fashion eCommerce marketplace. Our panels are designed to streamline operations and boost your fashion business.

    • Admin Panel

    • User App

    • Vendor App

    • Deliveryman App

    Admin Panel

    Order Management

    Efficiently manage orders from placement to fulfillment. Track, filter & export order status, process returns, and handle customer inquiries seamlessly from your eCommerce fashion software.

    Product Management

    Easily add, edit, and organize apparel and fashion items by setting categories, brands & attributes. Showcase your collection with high-quality images and detailed descriptions to captivate shoppers.

    Promotion Management

    Boost sales and customer engagement with targeted campaigns. Create, manage, and track promotional campaigns to drive traffic and increase revenue in your fashion marketplace.

    Brand Wise Products

    Organize products by brand for an enhanced shopping experience & build strong brand partnerships. You can highlight popular fashion brands & make it easy for shoppers to find their preferred labels.

    Category Setup

    Customize and manage fashion product categories, sub categories & sub-sub-categories for seamless navigation through the fashion eCommerce marketplace to create an intuitive shopping experience.

    Report & Analysis

    Gain valuable insights by tracking sales, product reports, order reports, customer behavior, and inventory levels. Make data-driven decisions to optimize and grow your apparel & fashion marketplace.

    Explore Admin Demo

    User App

    Multi Language Support

    Appeal to a global fashion audience by offering seamless navigation & product details in multiple languages, as well as a personalized shopping experience through your fashion eCommerce platform.

    Wallet & Loyalty Points

    Reward loyal customers & encourage repeat purchases with wallets & loyalty programs from your fashion eCommerce marketplace solution. Retain users by offering effortless transactions through wallet.

    Multiple Payment Methods

    Provide flexibility & convenience with multiple payment options. Accept credit cards, wallets, offline payments & other methods to ensure a smooth & secure checkout process for fashion shoppers.

    Guest Login & Checkout

    Minimize obstacles by letting fashion enthusiasts shop & complete their purchases without creating an account. Reduce cart abandonment & give a positive impression of luxury fashion eCommerce sites.

    Multiple Deals & Coupons

    Attract & retain customers on your fashion eCommerce site with discounts. Set up banners, offer coupons, flash deals, deal of the day, and featured deals to encourage repeat visits & boost sales.

    Share Media Files on Chat

    Elevate customer support with media-sharing features through the chatting option. Allow customers to share images & outfit inspirations for any queries or issues about your online fashion marketplace.

    Explore User App Demo

    Seller App

    Easy Vendor Registration

    Streamline the onboarding process for fashion store owners with easy vendor registration. Simplify account creation to quickly attract and empower new vendors on your apparel eCommerce solution.

    Product Management

    Stores can manage fashion products by adding, editing, & organizing with ease. They can optimize product listings for search visibility on your apparel eCommerce solutions for fashion industry.

    Coupon Management

    Vendors can create enticing promotions to increase sales and attract more customers to your fashion eCommerce site. They can add & manage promotional codes driving the overall growth of the platform.

    Order Management

    Vendors of your platform can optimize the order fulfillment process by tracking, updating, and processing fashion orders efficiently. This way they ensure timely deliveries and customer satisfaction.

    Vendor Wallet

    Enable vendors to manage their earnings, track sales, & withdraw funds with ease, ensuring financial transparency. With this feature, fashion stores can access & manage their earnings conveniently.

    Limited Stock Notification

    Prevent stockouts with limited stock notifications on your fashion eCommerce platform. Alert vendors when inventory levels are low & allow them to restock popular fashion items & avoid lost sales.

    Explore Vendor App Demo

    Deliveryman App

    Easy Login

    Admins create and verify accounts for delivery personnel. Once verified, they can access the app immediately. This ensures fast and timely delivery of fashion items.

    Order Delivery Management

    Let deliverymen accept and prioritize deliveries to efficiently deliver each and every product to customers' doorsteps on time. This way they can maintain customer satisfaction and be transparent.

    Active Status

    Empower delivery personnel to instantly update their availability status. It leads to improved management and allocation of delivery responsibilities, ultimately ensuring seamless delivery operations.

    Live Chat

    Allow delivery personnel to interact with customers and support teams instantly to resolve issues and provide updates. This helps operate your fashion marketplace smoothly and gain customers' trust.

    Deliveryman Wallet

    Delivery personnel can track their income, view payment history, and withdraw earnings securely through the wallet feature. This feature provides transparent transaction history and timely payouts.

    Earning Statement

    Provide detailed earning statements for delivery personnel of the fashion marketplace. Allow them to review their earnings & income breakdowns to maintain financial transparency and accountability.

    Explore Deliveryman App Demo

    Increase Your Earnings with Flexible Revenue Options

    As an online fashion marketplace owner, you can experience the most privileges and enjoy multiple revenue streams at the same time! With 6Valley, you can set vendor-wise commissions, charge order or category-wise shipping, and sell in-house products & maximize your profits effortlessly.

    Frequently Asked Questions

    1. What is a fashion eCommerce platform?

    A fashion eCommerce platform is a software solution that allows you to create and manage an online store for selling fashion items. It includes tools for product management, order processing, payment integration, and more.

    2. What are the key features of a fashion eCommerce marketplace software?

    Key features include advanced search and filtration, local and international business support, cross-platform performance, multiple payment methods, and user retention tools, all designed to enhance the shopping experience and streamline operations.

    3. How can 6Valley support luxury fashion eCommerce sites?

    6Valley's fashion eCommerce marketplace software is designed to handle high-end fashion products with features like high-quality image support, advanced filtering, and a dedicated Lifestyle theme that attracts luxury fashion shoppers.

    4. What kind of support do you provide?

    6Valley provides full documentation to guide you through the setup process, as well as professional installation and customization services.

    Start Your Fashion eCommerce Marketplace Today!
